technique: Real-time gray-scale and color Doppler imaging performed.
findings: Uterus appears mildly heterogeneous; endometrial thickness measures 14.45 mm.
Major vessels show unremarkable waveform on Doppler.
Liver appears ill-defined with no focal lesions.
Common bile duct measures 8.93 mm, within normal limits.
Soft tissue region demonstrates homogeneous without fluid collection.
Left kidney shows ill-defined, corticomedullary differentiation preserved.
